actors.name: Shah Rukh Khan
actors.info: Known as the 'King of Bollywood', Shah Rukh Khan is one of the most successful and influential actors in Indian cinema.

actors.name: Salman Khan
actors.info: A superstar with a massive fan following, Salman Khan is famous for his action-packed roles and charitable work.

actors.name: Allu Arjun
actors.info: A leading actor in Telugu cinema, Allu Arjun is celebrated for his dance skills and versatile performances.

actors.name: Mahesh Babu
actors.info: Mahesh Babu is a top Telugu actor known for his charm, action roles, and box office hits.

actors.name: Prabhas
actors.info: Prabhas gained international fame with the Baahubali series and is a major star in Indian cinema.

actresses.name: Deepika Padukone
actresses.info: One of the highest-paid actresses in India, Deepika Padukone is known for her powerful roles and global presence.

actresses.name: Alia Bhatt
actresses.info: Alia Bhatt is acclaimed for her acting range and has delivered several critically and commercially successful films.

actresses.name: Rashmika Mandanna
actresses.info: A rising star in South Indian cinema, Rashmika Mandanna is loved for her charm and performances.

actresses.name: Kareena Kapoor Khan
actresses.info: Kareena Kapoor Khan is a versatile actress known for her iconic roles and fashion sense.

actresses.name: Samantha Ruth Prabhu
actresses.info: Samantha is a leading actress in Telugu and Tamil cinema, celebrated for her acting and social work.
